sourceOfFunds.purpose: Atal Tinkering Lab provides a platform for the students to explore and experiment with their scientific skills. ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: SARASWATI SEVABHAVI SANSTHA work approach has always been â€˜constructive developmentâ€™ coupled with local community participation. The organization has been working on diverse issues, confronting the marginalised sections of rural society, like: Poverty alleviation at the village level through accessing various government schemes Health awareness wherein reproductive and child health promotion; HIV AIDS prevention and sanitation enhancement were undertaken Elimination of child labour; rescuing existing child labourers and rehabilitating them through education Agriculture development and extension programs with a special emphasis on promotion of organic farming Developing livelihood access to destitute women apart from those belonging to the Scheduled Castes Promotion of saving and credit groups with an objective of developing self help groups amongst women Enhancing access to water resources for drinking and irrigation purpose Micro-credit promotion for marginalised sections of the rural society Youth development through skill training and information dissemination Solid waste management training and demonstration at the village level Natural Resource management

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Activities: Saraswati Shikshan Mahila Mandal is a NGO running in a tribal and naxal area of Chandrapur and Gadchiroli since 1994. The institution works for women and girls, who are deserted and distressed such as unwed mothers,widows,ex-prisoners,HIV/AIDS affected,sex workers etc.We provide them with emotional and legal counseling, give them vocational training such as weaving on amber charkha, beauty parlour courses,typing,nursing,computer,fashion designing, montessary training, karate training by experts etc. Women caught in trafficking are sent to us by judiciary, we expertise in rehabilitating them. We organise legal awareness programs approx about 40-50 every year with the help of Hon Judges and Advocates. Our achievements: 1.President Adv Vijaya Bangde is honored with Ahilyabai Holkar Award by Hon Chief Minister of Maharashtra. 2. NALSA has awarded us for the best performance in legal services. 3.Best Services award by National Council of Women. 4. Savitribai Phule Maharashtra government award for the Women Education. 5. Sahayadri Doordarshan Award for the best services in Women Empowermet and upliftment.

ngoList.title: SARRP
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: SARRP (Spreading Awareness on Reptiles and Rehabilitation Programe) is an NGO registered in the year 2010, which works for reptiles, wild birds and other wildlife cause. However the main agenda of our organization is to rescue reptiles, wild birds etc who are encroaching into suburb / city and to educate people to avoid mishaps. Few members are working from more than decade and have dedicated their time and experience to help human population understand the vital importance of nature and its ecological balance. SARRP NGO has more than 100 dedicated volunteers which perform various activities from rescue missions to awareness campaigns. Many times it happens that wild birds / reptiles etc dwell in human captivity which creates danger for both, and this is when volunteers of SARRP takes charge by rescuing the animal and saving life of both animal and human, thus avoiding the chances of accidents like snake bites or other casualties.
